instruction: Generate a business plan for a pet-sitting business.
output: The key focus of our business plan is to provide a top-notch pet sitting service. We are committed to making sure that pet owners have access to reliable, trustworthy, and professional pet care. Our services will include daily check-ins, emergency pet care, vet visits, and overnight stays. We will also offer an online booking and payment system for our customers to easily and conveniently book services. We plan to provide services in a variety of regions and build relationships with local veterinarians. We will also build an online platform for customers to leave reviews and ratings.
